prizes.name: PS5 Standard Edition + extra DualSense + Racthet & Clank + Ghost of Tsushima
Apple Watch SE
Electric Scooter Xiaomi Mi Essential

Final Badge Challenge.descriptions: You participate in talks and workshops, you talk with every company you can and participate in every tournament. Now you are left with a bunch of badges, what do you do?! Every badge comes with a set of entries to the Final Badge Draw! On the last day of SEI, we will select three winning entries and their owners will be the lucky recipients of an amazing selection of prizes! The more badges you have, the more likely you are to win!

prizes.name: Nintendo Switch Lite (32 GB - Gray)
Backpack Samsonite Securipak Antitheft 15.6"
Smartwatch XIAOMI Mi Watch Lite Black 41 mm

Daily Badge Challenges - day one.descriptions: This one is easy. The winners are the three people with the most badges won on the first day! If there is a tie, the participant with the most tokens wins! If there’s still a tie after that, we’ll toss a coin! The badges you win before SEI starts will be counted on this day.

prizes.name: Monitor LG 27QN600-B IPS 27" 75Hz 2560x1440p
Mouse Laser Logitech MX Master 3 Wireless/Bluetooth 4000DPI Graphite
Headphones Bluetooth True Wireless JBL Live 300TWS - Black

Daily Badge Challenges - day two.descriptions: The same rules as day one apply. However only the badges you win on the second day count towards this prize.

prizes.name: Gaming Chair Alpha Gamer Cygnus RGB Black
Headset Razer Kraken Kitty Edition Quartz
SSD WD My Passport 500GB

Daily Badge Challenges - day three.descriptions: The same rules as day one (again). However only the badges you win on the third day count towards this prize.

prizes.name: Apple AirPods Pro (In Ear - Noise Canceling - White)
Mechanical Keyboard Corsair K60 RGB Pro Gaming Cherry Viola PT
Nespresso Coffee Maker + Capsules + Coffee Mugs

Daily Badge Challenges - day four.descriptions: This is getting a little repetitive… The same rules as day one (again). The difference is that only the badges you win on the fourth day count towards this prize.

prizes.name: Galaxy Tab S6 Lite

CV Challenge.descriptions: Our sponsors want your CV. You want them to have it. And why not try to win a Samsung Galaxy Tab S6 Lite while you’re at it? Submit your CV to cv@seium.org to enter the contest and win this amazing prize! It goes without saying that by sending us your CV, you give us consent to share it with our Silver, Gold and Exclusive sponsors. In order to enter the contest, you have to submit your CV until Friday, the 18th, at 17h.

prizes.name: Chess Set

Chess Tournament.descriptions: Big brain? Then come and show it off! If you can manage to win, we have a very nice, wood chess set to give you!

prizes.name: Steam Voucher - 30€ per member

CS:GO Tournament.descriptions: Make a team and come show off your talent in our CS:GO tournament! We have a limit of 8 teams, so make sure you move fast!

prizes.name: Hak5 USB Rubber Ducky (Ethical Hacking Device)

CTF.descriptions: Self explanatory, right? Test your security and general skills and find those pesky flags in our CTF! Be one of the first three to submit all the flags and win an awesome prize!

prizes.name: POLAROID Now Black

Photography.descriptions: Take a cool photo on your favorite week and share it on your instagram with the following hashtags: #sei22 #sei22challenge and tag @sei.uminho. Your profile must be public so everyone can see your entry. The most creative picture will be chosen by a jury and win an amazing Polaroid camera! This contest starts after the Opening Ceremony on Tuesday.
